medical_history.chief_complaint: 5 day history of right lower quadrant pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 days ago with right lower quadrant pain without associated fevers or chills. Symptoms have shown mild relief of baseline acid reflux with Pepto-Bismol. There have been some loose stools per day. This is the first episode of pain like this. No evidence of obstruction or peritonitis.
